abstract.t: This document defines the requirements for Drone Remote Identification Protocol (DRIP) Working Group protocols to support Unmanned Aircraft System Remote Identification and tracking (UAS RID) for security, safety and other purposes. Complementing external technical standards as regulator-accepted means of compliance with UAS RID regulations, DRIP will: facilitate use of existing Internet resources to support UAS RID and to enable enhanced related services; enable online and offline verification that UAS RID information is trustworthy.
